categories: Category:Battles of the Great Jedi Purge

nodes.text:
In 18 BBY after the ambush near the Twins, Thi Xon Yimmon, Cerean leader of the Whiplash resistance, was captured by the Galactic Empire; Vader later jailed Yimmon in the Kantaros Station guarded by a Inquisition's contingent commanded by Probus Tesla.
However the news of the location of the prison soon arrived to the ears of the criminal underground and later to the various resistance fighters; two escape's plan were putted in act, one by the Whiplash members Den Dhur and I-5YQ, followed by the Antarian Ranger Sacha Swiftbird, who posed as Black Sun members, the other by the Jedi Knight Jax Pavan.
In the fighting Sacha killed Probus, saving Pavan, and Pavan himself dueled with Darth Vader but in the end Yimmon was freed, and all the resistance fighters escaped from the space station.
